name: Blortian Switch
description:
This is the game that was made by Ender__Cow for the first Twitch MicroJam!
https://itch.io/jam/twitch-microjam-1 

-This game was made in 8 hours on Twitch (twitch.tv/Ender__Cow) using premade assets from https://opengameart.org/ and https://game-icons.net/ 

 -Music was sourced from https://incompetech.com/

Game description:   

-Blortian Switch: In this platformer, players must jump around (WASD/Space) and activate colour coded switches before time runs out. Players try and activate as many of these switches as possible to increase their score! To activate switches, the player must swap between 3 coloured alien characters and hit switches with the correct coloured being (Q/W/D).
